Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a brown-grey thick-walled pottery vessel, the fabric is relatively coarse and contains many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of a black-painted design or text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393613) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393613)
